Package minymph_project

Class Moves

java.lang.Object
minymph_project.Moves
public class Moves extends Object
Represents a move in the Minymph game with attributes such as name, damage, PP (Power Points), critical rate, and any potential side effect. Moves can be chosen by players and listed for reference.

  • Constructor Summary

    • Moves

      public Moves(GUI gui, String name, Integer damage, Integer PP, Float critRate, Float accuracy, String sideEffect)
      Constructs a new Move with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      gui - the GUI associated with the game
      name - the name of the move
      damage - the damage value of the move
      PP - the Power Points of the move
      critRate - the critical rate of the move
      sideEffect - any side effect the move may have
      accuracy - accuracy of the move

    • chooseMove

      public void chooseMove(Consumer<Moves> callback)
      Opens a dialog for the user to choose a move from the list of normal moves. Once selected, the move is passed to a callback function.
      Parameters:
      callback - the function to process the selected move
